title: I built zzrot's on rek'sai
body:
and I got an S rank. (not plus tho)

my end build was: {{item:3172}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3512}} {{item:3717}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3362}} 

after a while i was just kinda messin around...

it was super hilarious late game... i took 90.000 some odd damage that game... had 8 deaths, but most were just me doing stupid stuff... I don't get to be ahead very often... so i have fun when i do. the game ended and their team had 12 kills more than ours, but we still won pretty handily.

aside from garen, anyone else have fun with zzrot's?
